hiveArticle.title: White is White Challenge: Flowers
hiveArticle.body:
My today's entry for #WhiteIsWhite challenge by @dmcamera is a beautiful looking flower. This flower is mainly used for beautifying the houses and all. They look good in bunches.

<hr>

​

![1.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmcJWZpqmEyJPNrqvwLVyvqNSGLvzFzSU6wZtVf7bWQhY6/1.jpg)

​

![2.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmRQ2KUW4uJJHjtp7fH5FkvEc131yts7C8Si8TSJAsuRZh/2.jpg)

​

<hr>
